name: pangolin
description: Crud helper using mongoose to make creation of api fast

scripts.test: npm run check:node && npm run check:web && npm run check:web-no-bigint
scripts.build:dts: npm run build:ts && api-extractor run --typescript-compiler-folder node_modules/typescript --local && node etc/clean_definition_files.cjs
scripts.build: npm run build:dts && npm run build:bundle
scripts.check:lint: eslint -v && eslint --ext '.js,.ts' --max-warnings=0 src test && npm run build:dts && npm run check:tsd
